string.value: Show the aliens how many brave Maplers there are in Maple World! For every hour you're online, OSSS will issue you 5 #b#t04310004#s#k.
Since OSSS will be issuing you 5 #b#t04310004#s#k every hour you're logged in, you should stay connected and not log off.
You received 5 #b#t04310004#s#k for staying online for an hour. Good job doing your part to scare away the aliens!
I've been thinking... If the aliens realized how united Maplers are, they might think twice about invading.
#bSo for every hour that passes while you are logged in#k, the OSSS will recognize your effort and issue you 1 #b#t04310004#.
When one hour has passed, the 0 Minute Timer that you've been issued will turn into a 60 Minute Timer. When that occurs, please exchange it for a #b#t04310004##k.
The #b#t04310004##k can be used to purchase cells to upgrade your suit. Just talk to #b#p9250135##k.
Having enough medals is very important, so don't miss out on any medals.
Good luck.\r\nRemember that the future of Maple World is in your hands.
Who then will stand up for Maple World...?
The Timer has changed to 60 minutes.
I will issue you the #b#t04310004#s#k. You can use them to purchase cells for upgrading your suit. Just talk to #b#p9250135##k.
You haven't completed your assignment yet.
